misc.post: It is very unlikely there is any other intelligent life in our galaxy. Proffessor Brian Cox makes that clear in Are We Alone. The Catholic church has been forced to move with the times or die, and many mainstream churches have done the same. Being forced to move is nothing to be proud of and its time they moved towards contraception. We are moral beings in a hostile amoral universe. Our morality o is often weak or absent hence the state of the world. That God should create such a crazy situation seems to me and many highly unlikely..
misc.title: Scientific truth is a pathway to God
